title: Hanping Chinese Dictionary Pro v3.0.4 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009			

Requirements: Android 1.5+
Overview: Android's most popular Mandarin Chinese dictionary.



Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search Hanzi/Chinese, Pinyin or English. Also displays Zhuyin (Bopomofo)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Both Simplified and Traditional Chinese characters supported
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Chinese handwriting recognition built in!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mandarin audio* - over 2,000 audio files of a real native Chinese speaker (stored on SD card)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Live search - results update as-you-type
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Progressive results - as you scroll down, progressively deeper searches are seamlessly performed
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Offline access to all features (unless specified)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search history, Starred words, Word lists
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom search using wildcards
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Widgets (two sizes available)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Clipboard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Night mode (black background)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quick Search Box support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Voice recognition (online only and only on supported devices)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Useful links to websites e.g. YellowBridge and nciku (online only)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Uses CC-CEDICT dictionary data (stored on SD card) and optionally (as in-app purchase) ABC Chinese-English dictionary
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports Move to SD card
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ No ads!


Install Hanping Chinese Dictionary Pro v3.0.4 Final By bobiras2009.apk
Do not run the program after installation
Install Lucky Patcher v2.3.3 Final By bobiras2009.apk
Select Hanping from list and long press
Select "Patch on reboot"
Select "Remove License Verification"
Reboot the phone.


                                  By bobiras2009
